thought.text: Ah, I need to make sure the matrices are compatible for multiplication. Let me fix that:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpyjyraizy/sympy && python -c "
from sympy import MatrixSymbol
from sympy.printing.latex import LatexPrinter
A = MatrixSymbol('A', 2, 2)
B = MatrixSymbol('B', 2, 2)
l = LatexPrinter()

# Test the case from the issue
expr = A - A*B - B
print(f'A - A*B - B: {l._print_MatAdd(expr)}')

# Test simpler case
expr2 = A - B
print(f'A - B: {l._print_MatAdd(expr2)}')

# Test the working case
expr3 = A - 2*B
print(f'A - 2*B: {l._print_MatAdd(expr3)}')
"

function.arguments:
{"command": "cd /tmp/tmpyjyraizy/sympy && python -c "
from sympy import MatrixSymbol
from sympy.printing.latex import LatexPrinter
A = MatrixSymbol('A', 2, 2)
B = MatrixSymbol('B', 2, 2)
l = LatexPrinter()

# Test the case from the issue
expr = A - A*B - B
print(f'A - A*B - B: {l._print_MatAdd(expr)}')

# Test simpler case
expr2 = A - B
print(f'A - B: {l._print_MatAdd(expr2)}')

# Test the working case
expr3 = A - 2*B
print(f'A - 2*B: {l._print_MatAdd(expr3)}')
"", "security_risk": "MEDIUM"}
function.name: execute_bash
